uls-desc: Ko a tontona sobie yaga ka o na kaa iri kɔkɔre ane na maale kɔkɔre sɛgeroo
ext-uls-undo-language-tooltip-text-local: Kɔkɔre kyili la ko a wiki ŋa. kaa fo [[Special:GlobalPreferences|global preferences]] na leɛre kɔkɔre ko wikiri zaa.
uls-betafeature-desc: Wuli a kɔkɔre pɛll vɛɛseŋ ŋmaa, ne a kɔkɔɛ na naŋ taa tɔna ko fo.
ext-uls-display-settings-desc: Sɛte a kɔkɔre naŋ maŋ de toŋ ne Menu ane sɛgere semmo
ext-uls-language-buttons-help: Kyili a menus kɔkɔre. Yelbulo kɔkɔre koŋ taa kanyifɛroŋ zaa.
ext-uls-display-settings-anon-log-in-cta: [[Special:UserLogin|Yuo kpɛ]] na iri kɔkɔ yuo ko a menus.
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-title: Danloodi sɛgere semmo bonwulaa ka fõõ wa boɔra o
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-info: Danloodi moroo sɛgere semmo  otomatikal kyɛ bare kaa iri boɔre sɛgere semmo.
ext-uls-webfonts-select-for-ui-info: Sɛgere semmo naŋ tona korɔ tontona tonniŋe
ext-uls-webfonts-select-for-content-info: Sɛgere semmo naŋ tona korɔ yelbulo
ext-uls-input-settings-desc: Sɛgerɛ ne la kɔkɔ yuo be?
ext-uls-input-settings-ui-language: Kɔkɔre naŋ maŋ de sɛgerɛ neŋ
jquery-ime-disable-text: De a yideme kiibɔɔde toŋ neŋ
ext-uls-input-disable: ŋmaa a de eŋ tontoŋ bomma
ext-uls-input-enable: eŋ a de eŋ tontoŋ bomma
ext-uls-input-disable-info: De embo tontoŋ bomma ŋmaaɛ la
ext-uls-input-settings-noime: De eŋ sobi-tuuri zaa kyebe ko a kɔkɔre ŋa.
ext-uls-input-disable-notification: De eŋ tontoŋ bomma ŋmaaɛ la
ext-uls-input-disable-notification-info-: Fo na baŋ eŋ la a de eŋ tontoŋ bomma wagere zaa yi a kɔkɔre sɛgeroo eŋɛ.
Fo na baŋ eŋ la a de eŋ tontoŋ bomma wagere zaa yi a kɔkɔre sɛgeroo naŋ tɔre a kɔkɔre pɛll.
ext-uls-compact-link-info: Kɔkɔɛ zaa (daaŋ iribu yi yitaaloŋ boɔre a fõõ ane noba mine)
ext-uls-compact-language-links-preferenc: Toŋ neŋ [[$1|kɔkɔ lantaa pɛll]], ne kɔkɔɛ naŋ taa tɔna ko fo.
ext-uls-compact-no-results: A peegyi ŋa ba kye a kɔkɔre na poɔ fo naŋ bɔ.
ext-uls-setlang-error: Ɛɛrɔ wa be la be kyɛ ka fo apdeetiri fo kɔkɔ boɔraa. Ɛɛrɔ: $1
ext-uls-setlang-message: A liŋki fo naŋ tu boɔra la a tontonniŋe ka o sãã kyɛ $1 ($2)
ext-uls-empty-state-desc: Kɔkɔre zaa naŋ ba kyebe pampana ŋa
ext-uls-empty-state-header-actions-avail: Kɔkɔre zaa kyebe sɛre. Paale bompaalaa?
ext-uls-empty-state-desc-actions-availab: Vɛŋ ka a yelbulo be kɔkɔ yaga poɔ.
